1.title: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
1.plot: In Florida, recently divorced Karen Pannell, is found brutally slain in her own home and her boyfriend is on hand to help investigators find her killer--but investigators uncover his true motive and deadly secrets.

2.title: Where There's Smoke...
2.plot: Up and coming lawyer Michael Fletcher can barely keep it together as he calls police to his suburban Detroit home. Upon arrival, officers find Fletcher's wife, Leann, dead from an apparent accidental self-inflicted gunshot wound.

3.title: Lethal Lovers
3.plot: In Huntington Beach two well respected doctors, Carolyn and Ken Stahl, are found shot to death on the side of a highway. As police unravel this baffling case they find the power couple had a less than perfect marriage.

imdb.plot outline: Casanova Killers is a new crime series about love for BIO TV, lust, and murder--three things that, unfortunately, go hand in hand all too often. Each episode showcases the real-life stories of people who seduce their victims with devilish good looks, irresistible charm, and all the right moves. From the outside, they look like a fantasy come true, but behind the "Don Juan" façades are ugly, cold-blooded killers. A fictional writer narrates these cautionary tales of love gone way wrong.
imdb.title: Casanova Killers

Each episode showcases the real-life stories of people who seduce their victims with devilish good looks, irresistible charm, and all the right moves. A fictional writer narrates these cautionary tales of love gone way wrong.::Anonymous
